mapper.sql: ID, SYSTEM_ID, SYSTEM_MODULE_ID, REPOSITORY, GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, VERSION, NEXUS_PATH, REMARK, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select: select * from tbl_artifact_tag tat left join tbl_artifact_info tai on tai.id=tat.ARTIFACT_ID where tat.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE=#{ENVIRONMENT_TYPE} and tai.system_id=#{system_id} and tai.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{SYSTEM_MODULE_ID} and status=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
insert into tbl_artifact_info (SYSTEM_ID, SYSTEM_MODULE_ID, REPOSITORY, GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, VERSION, NEXUS_PATH, REMARK, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values ( #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{repository,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update tbl_artifact_info
SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SYSTEM_MODULE_ID = #{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REPOSITORY = #{repository,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXUS_PATH = #{nexusPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT info.ID,info.REPOSITORY,info.ARTIFACT_ID, info.CREATE_DATE,info.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,info.VERSION,SUBSTR(info.VERSION,1,5) ver FROM tbl_artifact_info info LEFT JOIN tbl_artifact_tag tag ON info.ID = tag.ARTIFACT_ID WHERE info.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND tag.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE = #{env} and info.status=1
AND info.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID = #{systemModuleId}
AND info.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID is null
ORDER BY info.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC limit 0,100
